title: Google\Cloud\Compute\V1\SavedAttachedDisk
name: SavedAttachedDisk
description:
DEPRECATED: Please use compute#savedDisk instead. An instance-attached disk resource.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.compute.v1.SavedAttachedDisk

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.auto_delete
params.description: Specifies whether the disk will be auto-deleted when the instance is deleted (but not when the disk is detached from the instance).

params.name: data.boot
params.description: Indicates that this is a boot disk. The virtual machine will use the first partition of the disk for its root filesystem.

params.name: data.device_name
params.description: Specifies the name of the disk attached to the source instance.

params.name: data.disk_encryption_key
params.description: The encryption key for the disk.

params.name: data.disk_size_gb
params.description: The size of the disk in base-2 GB.

params.name: data.disk_type
params.description: [Output Only] URL of the disk type resource. For example: projects/project /zones/zone/diskTypes/pd-standard or pd-ssd

params.name: data.guest_os_features
params.description: A list of features to enable on the guest operating system. Applicable only for bootable images. Read Enabling guest operating system features to see a list of available options.

params.name: data.index
params.description: Specifies zero-based index of the disk that is attached to the source instance.

params.name: data.interface
params.description: Specifies the disk interface to use for attaching this disk, which is either SCSI or NVME. Check the Interface enum for the list of possible values.

params.name: data.kind
params.description: [Output Only] Type of the resource. Always compute#attachedDisk for attached disks.

params.name: data.licenses
params.description: [Output Only] Any valid publicly visible licenses.

params.name: data.mode
params.description: The mode in which this disk is attached to the source instance, either READ_WRITE or READ_ONLY. Check the Mode enum for the list of possible values.

params.name: data.source
params.description: Specifies a URL of the disk attached to the source instance.

params.name: data.storage_bytes
params.description: [Output Only] A size of the storage used by the disk's snapshot by this machine image.

params.name: data.storage_bytes_status
params.description: [Output Only] An indicator whether storageBytes is in a stable state or it is being adjusted as a result of shared storage reallocation. This status can either be UPDATING, meaning the size of the snapshot is being updated, or UP_TO_DATE, meaning the size of the snapshot is up-to-date. Check the StorageBytesStatus enum for the list of possible values.

params.name: data.type
params.description: Specifies the type of the attached disk, either SCRATCH or PERSISTENT. Check the Type enum for the list of possible values.
